channel.title: Command.... (Help please...)
channel.description:
Hello i know how to add object's with makeGlobalObject but like ingame is it possible to make a command like:
::spawnbank and its come a bank? NOT OPEN BANK but spawn a bank desk...
is it somthing like:
makeglobalobject(####, absx, absy, 0 , 0); ?
please help me...

item.title: Command.... (Help please...)
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Hello agine… i has get this working now but is it any method to do somthing like this?

if (command.startsWith(“object”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newObjectID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
if (newObjectID >= 0)
{
makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, newObjectID, heightLevel, 10);
sM(“You spawn an object”);
} else {
sM(“No such Object”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::object 1”);
sM(""+playerName+" spawned a “+objectName+” at "+absX , “+absY+”);
}}

somthing like this…

happy for answers
-Mele

Read full topic

Did you replace the “sM” with “sendMessage”?

Use as ::object 1"); }}
